title: Need help with my FPS
body: This has never happened before, I downloaded the latest graphics update for my Geforce GT 640 and ever since then i am getting loads of FPS drops, i have a fast, stable internet connection aswell. Can anyone help me out? thanks

replies.body: same thing happened when i updated my GT, just revert the update and it fixes it, its an error with the update they sent out, they want to fix try fix it by the 20th though
should be able to revert it using the Nvidia GeForce experience app, can get if off their main website, it will also optimise your league settings to run best with your comp if you want 2
I tried re-downloading it again, still league loads slow as, still getting alot of fps drops. I dont know what to do i need help

fine, unlike using the app, this is only 90% chance of working (but much easier)

go to control panel and open the _programs and features _  section, you should be able to find a file named(usually) _Date_ Geforce GT 640 driver update, or something similar, it will 100% have the nvidia logo and say 640 (maybe GT) in it somewhere, uninstall that and it will revert to the version before update, taking the reduced performance with it.
Message me in game i might be able to help :)
Add me now, i gotta go out for an hour or so, when I get back i will add you and we can go from there! Thanks for your assistance
